title: Simulated Timelines Schema
description: Defines the format for the JSON that represents the timelines for each build order (max 4 for team builds) in the WC3 Build Order Planner

items.description: Each item represents a single player's build order, in the array of all player build order's for the team

currentSimTime.description: The current sim time for this build

currentResources.description: The resources currently available to the player at this time

currentGold.description: The amount of gold the player currently has

currentLumber.description: The amount of lumber the player currently has

currentFood.description: The amount of food the player is currently using

currentFoodMax.description: The current maximum food cap for the player

activeTimelines.description: An array of timelines that have actions on them (which makes them 'active')

inactiveTimelines.description: An array of timeline that have no actions on them (which makes them 'inactive')
